title: History (A)
body: (A) of Madeira, with a series of twenty-seven colored engravings illustrative of the customs, manners, and occupations of the inhabitants of that Island. London, 1821. It is the work of William Combe (1741-1823).

William Combe: Author of the work (A) of Madeira

1821: Year of publication of the work (A) of Madeira
